narrative.narrative: East Air is the first private airline in Tajikistan. They are also the first operator of Airbus and Boeing aircraft in the country. They commenced operation in 2007 and have a hub at Kulob Airport. They operate at 3 airports in Tajikisrab, Bishkek in Kyrgyzstan and seven in Russia. There four planes are two A320's, a 737-300 and a 737-400. The 737-300 is operated for Daallo Airlines, an airline from the African country of Djibouti.
